reviews.text: This hotel is a hidden treasure! don't let the word hostal deter you. Private room with bath and a/c. Beds wonderfully comfortable, bathroom good (shower has rain head and hand held) so easily oversprays shower curtain. Breakfast was4.50 euro pp worth the money. Croissants bread, cold cuts, cheese, yogurt, cereal coffe or tea buffet, as much as you want, served in an quaint beautiful atrium. Wondereful locatoclose to reataurants, flamenco shoe, seville cathederal ans alcazar.
reviews.title: definately a gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of the hostel is brilliant. Near to the main attractions (cathedral and alcazar) and easy to get to. The hotel has a lovely character, rooms are modern with a brilliant power shower. Breakfast is available at €4 which is basic. The staff couldn't have been more helpful. Perfect base for a city break.
reviews.title: Excellent small hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was my first holiday in 2 years and from the moment we walked through the door it was absolutely perfect. The location was central to everything we wanted to see and do. The room was spacious and the bed comfortable. The entire staff was very attentive and always went above and beyond. I will be going back.
reviews.title: Perfect !!!

reviews.text: when we arrived in Sevilla, our original reservation at an apt fell apart. We needed to find a place immediately. We found this place, but it was full. It seemed so sweet, we asked to reserve for the next night and found a place for that eve. Marina was incredibly helpful. She offered to contact us at the other pension to let us know when the room was ready. She stored our bags, offered coffee,( from the very cool machine they have with hot foam), and treated us wonderfully. She was a delight to work with and made our stay even better! The room we had was wonderful and we were overall thrilled with our stay there.
reviews.title: wonderful staff person named Marina
